info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:31PM EDT until July 01 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Shenandoah County in northwestern Virginia... Southwestern Hardy County in eastern West Virginia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mathias, or 7 miles east of Rough Run, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Mathias, Lost City, Lost River and Brake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
